rules_text:
Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
Escape–{2}{W}{B}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard.
flavor_text:
[i]“The Returned serve the Shrouded, great Athreos // unable to leave without his blessing.”
— [/i]The Tymarea[i][/i]
notes:
!design Pipsqueak
!promo
!append (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
